00005 String& String::operator=(const String& src)
00006 {
00007         if(&src == this)
00008                 return *this;
00009 
00010         // Remove this string from its current reference chain
00011         if(--(*this->refcounter) == 0)
00012                 REMOVE_ARRAY(this->chars);
00013 
00014         // Attach this string to the reference chain of src
00015         this->len = src.len;
00016         this->chars = src.chars;
00017         this->refcounter = src.refcounter;
00018         (*this->refcounter)++;
00019 
00020         return *this;
00021 }

00039 String& String::operator<<=(const String& src)
00040 {
00041         if(&src == this)
00042                 return *this;
00043 
00044         if(!this->len)
00045                 this->operator=(src);
00046         else if(src.len)
00047         {
00048                 LPTSTR oldchars = this->chars;
00049 
00050                 // Remove this string from its current reference chain
00051                 if(--(*this->refcounter) == 0)
00052                         this->chars = (LPTSTR)realloc(this->chars, this->len + src.len + 1);
00053                 else
00054                 {
00055                         LPTSTR oldchars = this->chars;
00056                         this->chars = new TCHAR(this->len + src.len + 1);
00057                         _tcscpy_s(this->chars, this->len + src.len + 1, oldchars);
00058                 }
00059                 _tcscat_s(this->chars, this->len + src.len + 1, src.chars);
00060                 this->len += src.len;
00061 
00062                 // Create a new reference chain
00063                 *this->refcounter = 1;
00064         }
00065         return *this;

00112 bool String::operator==(const String& s)
00113 {
00114         if(this->IsEmpty())
00115                 return s.IsEmpty();
00116         else if(s.IsEmpty())
00117                 return false;
00118         else
00119                 return strcmp(this->chars, s.chars) == 0;
00120 }
00121 bool String::operator!=(const String& s)
00122 {
00123         if(this->IsEmpty())
00124                 return !s.IsEmpty();
00125         else if(s.IsEmpty())
00126                 return true;
00127         else
00128                 return strcmp(this->chars, s.chars) != 0;
00129 }
